roleset.name: to satirize or imitate

example.name: transitive
example.text: He parodied Confucian teachings by saying "Of all sins, filial piety is the worst *T*; of all virtues licentiousness is the greatest *T*."
example.arg: by saying "Of all sins, filial piety is the worst *T*; of all virtues licentiousness is the greatest *T*."

roleset.note: PARODY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'parody' based on survey of sentences in ECTB. (from parody.01-v predicate notes)
